set_location_on_map: Set your location on the map
manage_stations_and_network: Manage internet stations and network settings
keep_secret_warning: ⚠️ Keep this secret! Never share with anyone.
reset_identity_confirm: This will generate new Nostr keys and callsign. Your old identity will be lost. Continue?
about_description_1: Geogram is a comprehensive offline-first communication ecosystem designed for environments with limited or no internet connectivity.
about_description_2: It integrates radio communications (APRS/FM), BLE beacons, NOSTR-based messaging, and hybrid online/offline apps to enable proximity-based and radio-aware communication without internet dependency.
multi_platform_desc: Android, Desktop, Web, and embedded devices
mesh_networking_desc: Automatic forwarding through nearby devices via BLE
geographic_routing_desc: Grid-based message delivery to specific locations
collections_desc: Geogram Desktop includes a powerful Collections feature for sharing files and folders offline:
file_sharing_desc: Create collections of files to share with others
offline_sync_desc: Share collections via BLE or local network
copyright_text:
Copyright 2025 Geogram Contributors

Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
built_with_love:
Built with ❤️ for resilient,
decentralized communication
scan_local_network: Scan for stations on local network
station_instructions:
• Select ONE preferred station (star icon)
• Select multiple backup stations (checkmarks) for redundancy
• Stations may disclose their name and location coordinates
no_stations_selected: No stations selected. Select at least one preferred station.
delete_station_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}"?
clear_all_stations_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete ALL stations? This cannot be undone.
scan_complete: Network scan complete. Check log window for details.
connected_success: ✓ Connected to {0}! Check log window for details.
connection_failed: Connection failed. Check log window for details.
fill_name_and_url: Please fill in name and URL
url_must_start_with: URL must start with wss:// or ws://
map_instructions: Click anywhere on the map to set your location. Use mouse wheel or +/- buttons to zoom.
location_auto_detected_desc: Location detected from IP address. Click map or enter coordinates to change.
location_manual_desc: Click on map or enter coordinates manually
location_privacy_desc: Your location is stored locally and only shared when you explicitly choose to do so.
coordinate_help_text:
Latitude ranges from -90° (South Pole) to +90° (North Pole).

Longitude ranges from -180° (West) to +180° (East).

Use decimal format:
• New York: 40.7128, -74.0060
• London: 51.5074, -0.1278
• Tokyo: 35.6762, 139.6503
location_services_disabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable them in settings.
location_permission_permanent_denied: Location permission permanently denied. Please enable in app settings.
new_messages_desc: Notify when you receive new messages
nearby_devices_desc: Notify when devices are detected nearby
collection_updates_desc: Notify when collections are updated or synced
about_notifications_desc: Notifications help you stay informed about important events in Geogram. Settings are saved automatically and stored locally in your configuration file.
delete_collection_confirm_msg: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}"?
connected_devices_will_be_listed_here: Connected devices will be listed here
add_files_to_get_started: Add files or folders to get started
map_instructions: Click anywhere on the map to set your location. Use mouse wheel or +/- buttons to zoom.
location_auto_detected_desc: Location detected from IP address. Click map or enter coordinates to change.
location_manual_desc: Click on map or enter coordinates manually
coordinate_help_text:
Latitude ranges from -90° (South Pole) to +90° (North Pole).

create_channel_to_start: Create a channel to start chatting
select_channel_to_chat: Select a channel to start chatting
author: Author
no_known_participants: No known participants yet. Start chatting to add participants!
channel_already_exists: Channel with this callsign already exists
group_already_exists: A group with this name already exists
no_active_callsign: No active callsign. Please set up your profile first.
collection_type_exists_message: This collection type already exists. Each type can only have one instance.
collection_type_desc_files: Store and organize files in custom folders. Create multiple collections for different purposes like documents, photos, or projects.
collection_type_desc_forum: Discussion forum for threaded conversations and community discussions. Topics are organized by categories with support for replies and moderation.
collection_type_desc_chat: Real-time messaging with support for multiple channels. Perfect for team communication or group discussions.
collection_type_desc_blog: Publish articles and posts for sharing your thoughts, tutorials, or updates. Supports rich content with images and formatting.
collection_type_desc_events: Create and manage events with dates, times, locations, and attendee registration. Great for organizing meetups or activities.
collection_type_desc_news: Share news and announcements with your network. Keep your community informed about updates and important information.
collection_type_desc_www: Host a personal website with full HTML, CSS, and JavaScript support. Accessible via your station URL.
collection_type_desc_postcards: Send and receive digital postcards with images and personal messages. A fun way to share memories and greetings.
collection_type_desc_contacts: Store contact information for people and organizations. Keep your network organized and accessible.
collection_type_desc_places: Save and share locations with maps, coordinates, and descriptions. Document interesting places or share recommendations.
collection_type_desc_market: List items for sale, trade, or giveaway. A simple marketplace for your community.
collection_type_desc_alerts: Receive and manage alerts and notifications. Stay informed about important updates and events in your network.
collection_type_desc_groups: Organize people into groups for easier management and communication. Create teams or interest groups.
collection_type_desc_station: Station configuration for network communication settings. Manage how your node connects to the network.
collection_type_features_files: Organize files by folders|Share with specific users|Set visibility permissions|Multiple collections allowed
collection_type_features_forum: Threaded discussions|Categories and topics|User moderation|Pinned topics
collection_type_features_chat: Multiple channels|Text, image, and file sharing|Message history|Participant management
collection_type_features_blog: Rich text editor|Image embedding|Draft saving|Post scheduling
collection_type_features_www: Full web hosting|Custom HTML/CSS/JS|Accessible at station-url/callsign

new_update_description: Share news, announcements, or important information about this event

admins_help: Admins can edit event and delete content

registration_help: When enabled, attendees can mark themselves as "Going" or "Interested"
flyers_stored_event_folder: Flyers are stored in the event folder

group_visibility_desc: Only group members can see this event
title_min_3_chars: Title must be at least 3 characters
invalid_npub_format: Invalid NPUB format (must start with npub1)
title: Title
no_items_in_radius: No items found in the selected radius
sign_messages_desc: Automatically sign all outgoing messages with your NOSTR key
nostr_keys_required: Note: You need to set up your NOSTR keys in your profile to use message signing.
only_admin_manage_moderators: Only the chat administrator can manage moderators
remove_moderator_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this moderator?

welcome_message: An account was automatically generated for you. You can change your profile settings later in Settings.
welcome_customize_hint: Your unique callsign for the Geogram network is shown above.
extension_login_description: Use your browser extension (Alby, nos2x, etc.) to sign in. Your private key stays secure in the extension.
extension_not_available: No NOSTR extension detected. Install Alby or nos2x to use this feature.
extension_login_failed: Failed to login with extension. Please try again or check your extension.
onboarding_intro_description: Geogram is an offline-first communication app that works without internet. It uses Bluetooth mesh networking, NOSTR encryption, and radio integration to keep you connected anywhere.
onboarding_permission_location_short: For maps and geographic message routing
onboarding_permission_internet_short: For NOSTR relays and map tiles
onboarding_privacy_short: Your data stays on your device. Location is only shared when you choose.
find_location_first: Please find your location first by clicking 'Find Location'
address_not_found: Address not found. Try a different address.
geocoding_failed: Failed to look up address. Check your connection.
import_export_info: Export your profiles to save them outside the app folder. Import them later to restore after reinstalling.
name: Name
rollback_backups_desc: Previous versions are saved automatically before updates.
confirm_rollback_msg:
Are you sure you want to rollback to version {0}?

The application will need to be restarted after the rollback.
rollback_complete: Rollback complete! Please restart the application.
delete_backup_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}"?
backup_pinned: Backup pinned - will not be auto-deleted
auto_check_updates_desc: Check for updates when app starts
update_from_station_enabled: Updates will be downloaded from connected radio station (offgrid)
update_from_station_disabled: Updates will be downloaded directly from GitHub
running_latest_version: You are running the latest version
apk_installer_launched:
APK installer launched. Follow the prompts to complete installation.

Note: If you see "Problem parsing the package", you may need to uninstall the current app first (this happens when switching from debug to release builds due to different signing keys).
update_installed_restart: Update installed! Please restart the application.
install_update_failed:
Could not install update. Please check that "Install unknown apps" is enabled for Geogram in Settings.

If installation fails with "Problem parsing the package", try uninstalling the app first (required when switching from debug to release builds).
download_failed: Download failed or no binary available for this platform
permission_required_msg:
To install updates, Geogram needs permission to install apps from unknown sources.

Tap "Open Settings" to enable this permission, then return here to try again.
downloading_update_wait: Please wait while the update downloads
tap_to_download_install: Tap to download and install v{0}, released at {1}
tap_to_check_new_versions: Tap to check for new versions
http_api_description: Allow other devices on the network to connect to this device via HTTP
debug_api_description: Enable debug endpoints for testing and development. Only enable if you know what you're doing.
location_granularity_description: Control how precisely your location is shared with other devices. A larger value means more privacy but less precise location.
